about_the_game:
You lost a bet with your boss and now you're forced to stay in the office after hours to do extra work. Your job is to report anomalies and fix broken cameras. But it won't be so easy, as you'll have to deal with intruders breaking into your office and trying to murder you. Will you die or will you complete your job and get out of there just to come back the next day?

Strategy

You'll have to strategize, as the enemies are freely roaming around your office building actively hunting you. Hide under desks, lock doors or create distractions.

Task

Your main task is to complete your job quota. To do this you have to report any anomalies that you see on your laptop. Only after completing your quota will you be able to leave your office.

Survive the week

You'll have to survive a full week. However to make it easier, you can earn more money by reporting additional anomalies and you can use it to buy upgrades that will help you survive.
